name: World Of Mr. B
description:
Help this beautiful little blue guy survive!

Casual, fun, challenging. World of Mr.B features elements of puzzle, platform and adventure. Help this little monster escape from traps in wonderful and dangerous worlds.

Florest Level 

Fire Level

Ice Level

With the help of power-ups you can push through the limits, win records and overcome challenges more easily.

Always updated with new worlds and phases. It's endless fun!

Developers:
